The NYU Lecture Series - 1978-79: "The Wire Services: Get It First, Get It Fast, and Get It Right!" with Dottie Brooks, UPI; William Clabby, Dow Jones; and John Cunnif, AP. Reel I of II.

Housing annotation: "WNYU-FM Rebroadcast 4-7-81, 7-8pm" marked on container label in red ink. From the Media 78 Conference.
Format: 1/4" Open Reel Audio, Duration: 29 min.
